{\"libdef\":{ \"def\":\"833cd4e3\", \"app\":\"Led switch\"}, \"function\":[ {\"id\":1, \"label\":\"Led On\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"ledOn()\" }, {\"id\":2, \"label\":\"Led Off\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"ledOff()\" }, {\"id\":3, \"label\":\"Blink Led\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"ledBlink()\" }, {\"id\":4, \"label\":\"Cry a River\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"cryARiver()\" }, {\"id\":5, \"label\":\"Dry a River\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"dryARiver()\" }, {\"id\":6, \"label\":\"Thunder and Lightning\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"thunderAndLighting()\" }, {\"id\":7, \"label\":\"Snow\", \"type\":\"button\", \"call\":\"snow()\" } ] }
